item.title: Improving Deep Reinforcement Learning by Reducing the Chain Effect of Value and Policy Churn
item.description: Deep RL agents often suffer from instability due to the ‘chain effect’ of value and policy churn; this paper introduces CHAIN, a novel method to reduce this churn, thereby improving DRL performance an…
